summary: This modification changes Harkon and his minions to be leveled based on the Player\'s Level further than normal.
descriptionHtml:
--- REQUIRES DAWNGUARD ---

Place the ESP file into the Skyrim Data folder, and enable it within the Data files dialog. The following list shows what I did in the Creation Kit:

++ Changed Harkon\'s \"Max Calc\" to 100 (This makes him leveled to 100 instead of 60.)
++ Changed Gargoyles \"Max Calc\" to 100 and set them to PC level Mult.

As an \"intended\" side-effect, all skeletons and Draugr Templates have been changed to have a \"max Calc\" of 100, and are now all PC Level Mult enabled.

Modification is a suggestion from here: http://forums.nexusmods.com/index.php?/topic/826811-make-the-final-boss-of-dawnguard-harder
author: Iyeru

files.name: Leveled Harkon and Minions Main File
